item.title: No armour aloud in minigame?

@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Have you got items in your inventory, because if you dont have 28 free slots you cant enter? maybe make it so it deposits your items and everything for you, and if your got an items make it playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1; ?? :S just giving you some ideas.

item.title: No armour aloud in minigame?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Well i want my minigame to make it So no armour is aloud in the minigame… So when your in waiting room and it gos to teleport you if you have armour or anything in your inven it’ll hold you back and send a message too you… but it didn’t work and here’s my code.

if(PlayerHandler.generalTimer2 == 5) { toX = 3363; toY = 9641; heightLevel = 0; } else if(playerEquipment[playerCape] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerShield] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerHat] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerAmulet] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerChest] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerHands] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerFeet] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerRing] != -1 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] != -1&& freeSlots() != 28){ sM("You must bank EVERYTHING before playing Rc wars."); } }
Thats the armour part of my code… but it won’t work.

Read full topic
